thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 16 of 539
thread.title: Taylor

author: Taylor
title: Taylor
text: I have ordered a few dresses from Promgirl and this website has yet to let me down. I've ordered my senior prom dress this year and received it today, exactly when they said I would. I am nothing but impressed. It's true to size and true to color. The designs and the cut of the dress match the displayed picture. The prices are amazing and the quality is not disappointing. I had some trouble on my end tracking my order, so I emailed the customer service people and they responded within 24 hours explaining what I did wrong and supplying me with all the information I was seeking along with a link sending me exactly where I needed to look. The customer service is extremely polite and Promgirl is a google trusted store which adds that extra level of comfort. I am so very happy and I would recommend this site to anyone looking for quality dresses at an incredible price range.
